00078 
00079 class MicropolisTool(tiletool.TileTool):
00080 
00081 
00082     def __init__(
00083         self,
00084         toolIndex=-1,
00085         **args):
00086 
00087         tiletool.TileTool.__init__(
00088             self,
00089             **args)
00090 
00091         self.toolIndex = toolIndex
00092         self.lastX = 0
00093         self.lastY = 0
00094 
00095 
00096     def handleMouseDown(self, view, event):
00097 
00098         x, y = view.getEventXY(event)
00099         x = int(x)
00100         y = int(y)
00101         #print "DOWN", x, y, "index", self.toolIndex, view.engine.toolDown
00102         view.engine.toolDown(self.toolIndex, x, y)
00103         self.lastX = x
00104         self.lastY = y
00105 
00106 
00107     def handleMouseDrag(self, view, event):
00108 
00109         x, y = view.getEventXY(event)
00110         x = int(x)
00111         y = int(y)
00112         #print "DRAG", self.lastX, self.lastY, x, y, "index", self.toolIndex, view.engine.toolDrag
00113         view.engine.toolDrag(self.toolIndex, self.lastX, self.lastY, x, y)
00114         self.lastX = x
00115         self.lastY = y
00116 
00117 
00118     def handleMouseUp(self, view, event):
00119 
00120         #print "UP"
00121         self.handleMouseDrag(view, event)
00122 
00123 
00124     def tick(self, view):
00125 
00126         pass
00127 
00128

00131 
00132 class MicropolisChalkTool(tiletool.TileTool):
00133 
00134 
00135     def getCursorHotSpot(self, view):
00136         return (
00137             view.cursorX,
00138             view,cursorY,
00139         )
00140 
00141 
00142     def drawCursor(self, view, ctx):
00143 
00144         cursorX = view.cursorX
00145         cursorY = view.cursorY
00146         panX = view.panX
00147         panY = view.panY
00148 
00149         x = cursorX + panX
00150         y = cursorY + panY
00151 
00152         ctx.save()
00153 
00154         ctx.translate(
00155             x,
00156             y)
00157 
00158         ctx.set_line_width(
00159             4.0)
00160 
00161         ctx.move_to(
00162             0,
00163             0)
00164         ctx.line_to(
00165             0,
00166             -5)
00167         ctx.line_to(
00168             20,
00169             -25)
00170         ctx.line_to(
00171             25,
00172             -20)
00173         ctx.line_to(
00174             5,
00175             0)
00176         ctx.line_to(
00177             0,
00178             0)
00179         ctx.close_path()
00180 
00181         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00182             1.0,
00183             1.0,
00184             1.0)
00185 
00186         ctx.stroke_preserve()
00187 
00188         ctx.set_line_width(
00189             2.0)
00190 
00191         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00192             0.0,
00193             0.0,
00194             0.0)
00195 
00196         ctx.stroke()
00197 
00198         ctx.restore()
00199 
00200

00204 class MicropolisEraserTool(MicropolisTool):
00205 
00206 
00207     def getCursorHotSpot(self, view):
00208         return (
00209             view.cursorX,
00210             view,cursorY,
00211         )
00212 
00213 
00214     def drawCursor(self, view, ctx):
00215 
00216         cursorX = view.cursorX
00217         cursorY = view.cursorY
00218         panX = view.panX
00219         panY = view.panY
00220 
00221         x = cursorX + panX
00222         y = cursorY + panY
00223 
00224         ctx.save()
00225 
00226         ctx.translate(
00227             x,
00228             y)
00229 
00230         ctx.set_line_width(
00231             4.0)
00232 
00233         ctx.move_to(
00234             0,
00235             -10)
00236         ctx.line_to(
00237             10,
00238             0)
00239         ctx.line_to(
00240             0,
00241             10)
00242         ctx.line_to(
00243             -10,
00244             0)
00245         ctx.line_to(
00246             00,
00247             -10)
00248         ctx.close_path()
00249 
00250         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00251             1.0,
00252             1.0,
00253             1.0)
00254 
00255         ctx.stroke_preserve()
00256 
00257         ctx.set_line_width(
00258             2.0)
00259 
00260         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00261             0.0,
00262             0.0,
00263             0.0)
00264 
00265         ctx.stroke()
00266 
00267         ctx.restore()
